meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Molly Hewitt Julie Adair Laura Ashby Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7177.

td.p: Molly Hewitt, a writer and freelance proofreader from Hollywood, California
Julie Adair, a virtual assistant from Panama City, Florida
Laura Ashby, an attorney from Marietta, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,802)

tr.td: WHERE IS THAT?
COOKING METHODS
NEWSPAPERS & MAGAZINES
LEADER OF THE PACK
"OFF" WE GO
INTO THE WILD BLUE YONDER
